Name: Atlantis Hotel
Description:
Contemporary rooms in a high-rise property featuring a gym, a sauna and an indoor pool.
Set 1.3 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex, this modern high-rise hotel is also 1.5 km from historic Queen Victoria Market and 3 km from the harbour.
The contemporary rooms and suites include sitting areas, flat-screen TVs and free limited Wi-Fi, along with desks, minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some quarters offer city or harbour views.
A complimentary continental breakfast buffet is provided. There's an indoor pool, a sauna and a gym, plus a business centre and parking (surcharge).

Name: Quest NewQuay, Docklands
Description:
Contemporary units with balconies in a sophisticated apartment hotel with a gym & a terrace.
This sophisticated apartment hotel in a modern tower offers views of the Melbourne Star Observation Wheel. Itâ€™s a minuteâ€™s walk from the nearest tram stop and a 3-minute walk from The District Docklands open-air shopping mall.
Ranging from studios to 3-bedroom apartments, the contemporary units offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes, as well as tea and coffeemaking equipment. All feature balconies; some have laundry facilities, plus separate living and dining space.
Amenities include an airy lobby lounge, a gym, and a furnished terrace with BBQs. Thereâ€™s also meeting and event space. Breakfast and parking are available (on request).

Name: Oakwood Premier Melbourne
Description:
Laid-back rooms, studios & apartments in a refined, modern hotel with a gym, a restaurant & a bar.
Off the West Gate Freeway, this modern, upmarket hotel is 9 minutes' walk from the DFO South Wharf mall and 3 km from Flinders Street railway station.
Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, relaxed rooms provide Nespresso machines, and TVs with Chromecast. Upgraded rooms add panoramic city views and lounge access. Studios offer kitchens with fridges, microwaves and stovetops, plus washers/dryers. The 1- and 2-bedroom apartments add separate living rooms. There's room service.
Wi-Fi and parking are available. A breakfast buffet is served at the restaurant, and there's a bar. Other amenities include meeting facilities, a co-working space and a gym.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation, Serviced apartment

Name: Mercure North Melbourne
Description:
Unfussy rooms & suites in a straightforward hotel featuring a cafe/bar & an outdoor pool.
Set 2 km from the Melbourne Zoo, this low-key hotel in is a 10-minute walk from the University of Melbourne and 5 km from the Melbourne Cricket Ground.
Straightforward rooms feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, minibars, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded add lounge areas. Room service is available.
Amenities include a casual cafe/bar, a fitness room, an outdoor pool and a sauna. Breakfast and parking are available for a surcharge.
Fulladdress: And, Cnr Flemington Road, Harker St, VIC 3051

Name: The Larwill Studio Melbourne - Art Series
Description:
Trendy rooms with original artwork in an upmarket artist-themed hotel featuring chic dining & a bar.
In a contemporary building offering views of Royal Park, this upscale hotel dedicated to artist David Larwill is 2 km from Queen Victoria Market, and 5 km from Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex.
Featuring custom artwork and bedding, the fashionable rooms include free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, minibars, microwaves and yoga mats, as well as art books. Upgraded rooms add park views.
Loaner prams are available. There's an urban-chic cafe serving international cuisine, as well as a bar. Additional amenities include landscaped gardens and off-street parking (surcharge), plus supplies for creating art. There are also car and bike rentals.
Owner: The Larwill Studio Melbourne - Art Series (owner)

Name: Miami Hotel Melbourne
Description:
Humble rooms in a low-key budget hotel offering a shared kitchen & dining area, plus free Wi-Fi.
Near the shopping and dining on Errol Street, this modest budget hotel is 2 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex, and 3 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.
Simply furnished rooms include free Wi-Fi, and flat-screen TVs with satellite channels, as well as minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities.
Breakfast (fee) is available in a cafe that has a deck. Other amenities include a guest kitchen, a dining room and coin-operated laundry facilities.

Name: Pullman Melbourne Albert Park
Description:
Modern rooms in a polished property offering regional dining, meeting space & a breezy cocktail bar.
This upscale, contemporary hotel is 2.4 km from Luna Park theme park, 2.7 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens and 4.2 km from the Melbourne Convention Centre.
Modern rooms include 102-cm flat-screen TVs, iPod docks and Wi-Fi (fee), plus bathrooms with dual-head rainfall showers. Some rooms have lake views. Upgraded rooms provide access to a club lounge.
Dining options include a polished restaurant offering modern Australian cuisine and city views, along with a coffee bar and a breezy cocktail bar in an atrium. There's also a pool, a sauna and a fitness centre, as well as conference facilities for up to 1,600 people.

Name: The Ritz-Carlton, Melbourne
Description:
Upmarket hotel featuring a chic restaurant, an indoor pool & a spa, plus harbour views.
In a modern tower with views of Victoria Harbour, this upmarket hotel is a 15-minute walk from the Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre, 3 km from the National Gallery of Victoria and 22 km from Melbourne Airport.
Polished rooms, some with harbour views, feature floor-to-ceiling windows and TVs, as well as minifridges and Wi-Fi. Suites have separate living rooms and dining areas. Club quarters allow access to a lounge with free cocktails. Room service is available 24/7.
There's a chic restaurant with skyline views, plus a cocktail bar, an indoor infinity pool, a spa and a 24/7 fitness centre. Parking and breakfast are available.

Name: Melbourne Marriott Hotel Docklands
Description:
Chic rooms in an upmarket riverfront hotel with a rooftop infinity pool, plus a restaurant & bars.
In the Docklands shopping and dining district along the Yarra River, this upscale hotel is a 2-minute walk from a tram stop. It's 3 km from the Queen Victoria Market and 6 km from the Melbourne Skydeck.
Chic rooms have Wi-Fi, minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some offer river views. Club rooms add access to a private lounge with afternoon and evening snacks. Room service is available 24/7.
A rooftop terrace features an infinity pool, a kids' pool, a hot tub, and a bar serving small plates. Other amenities include a modern restaurant, a sleek cocktail bar and a coffee shop, as well as a gym. Breakfast and parking are available.

Name: Ink Hotel Melbourne Southbank
Description:
Trendy hotel offering contemporary, colourful rooms, plus a lobby cafe/bar with free all-day coffee.
Housed in a contemporary building with a glass facade, this trendy hotel on State Route 20 is a 5-minute walk from a tram stop and 8 minutes' walk from the Australian Centre for Contemporary Art.
Featuring vibrant furnishings, the modern, compact rooms have Wi-Fi access, smart TVs and minifridges. Upgraded rooms add living areas.
A relaxed lobby cafe/bar offers free all-day coffee. Breakfast is available (fee).

Name: AC Hotel Melbourne Southbank
Description:
Bright quarters, some with city views, in a luxe hotel offering a pool, a 24/7 gym & Spanish fare.
Set in an area with businesses, this choice hotel is 3 km from Port Melbourne Beach, 4 km from the National Gallery of Victoria and 25 km from Melbourne Airport.
Featuring floor-to-ceiling windows, contemporary rooms come with Wi-Fi, sitting areas, and TVs with Chromecast, as well as minifridges, and tea and coffeemakers. Upgraded rooms have city views. Suites add separate living spaces. Room service is available.
Breakfast and parking are offered. Spanish-inspired amenities include a poolside cocktail bar and a tapas lounge, plus an airy restaurant offering city views. There's also a 24-hour gym and an infinity pool with skyline views.

Name: City Edge North Melbourne Apartment Hotel
Description:
Laid-back hotel offering contemporary studios featuring kitchenettes, plus a coin-operated laundry.
This relaxed apartment hotel is less than a minute's walk from the nearest tram stop, 3 km from Melbourne Zoo and 10 minutes on foot from bustling Queen Victoria Market.
The understated, modern studios come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes. All have tea and coffeemaking facilities, and some offer balconies, patios and/or sofabeds.
Amenities include a coin-operated laundry and bike storage. Continental breakfast is available for a surcharge.
Owner: City Edge North Melbourne Apartment Hotel (owner)

Name: Middle Park Hotel
Description:
Modern quarters, some with fireplaces, in a stylish property offering a formal restaurant & a bar.
Overlooking Albert Park Lake, this stylish hotel is an 8-minute walk from the beach, 1 km from Lakeside Stadium and 3 km from Luna Park Melbourne amusement park.
Contemporary rooms feature high ceilings, Egyptian cotton linens, minibars, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, as well as free Wi-Fi, flat-screens and iPod docks. Suites add lake views, gas fireplaces, wet bars and claw-foot baths.
A formal restaurant offers private dining booths, and thereâ€™s a trendy bar with a courtyard. There's also a guest lounge.

Name: Rendezvous Hotel Melbourne
Description:
Elegant hotel with a warm restaurant & a laid-back bar, plus a spa & a fitness room.
In a circa-1913 building overlooking the Yarra River, this elegant hotel is 1.1 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex, and 1.5 km from the food stalls and cafes of Queen Victoria Market.
Modern, warmly decorated rooms have flat-screen TVs, work desks and limited free Wi-Fi, plus minibars, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites add separate sitting and dining areas. Room service is available, as are in-room spa treatments.
Amenities include a low-key bar and a relaxed restaurant serving international cuisine, as well as a spa, a fitness room and a business centre. A breakfast buffet and parking are available for a fee.
Categories: Hotel, Bar, Breakfast restaurant, Cocktail bar, Event venue, Extended stay hotel, Restaurant, Serviced accommodation, Wedding venue

Name: The Cullen Melbourne - Art Series
Description:
Hip, artist-inspired boutique hotel offering a casual bistro, a dumpling bar & a gym.
A 1-minute walk from a tram stop, this hip boutique hotel featuring artwork by artist Adam Cullen is 4 km from the National Gallery of Victoria and 6 km from Federation Square.
The modern studio suites, which feature original artwork and designer furniture, have free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus kitchenettes with minifridges and microwaves. Upgraded suites add balconies and/or separate living areas. Room service is available.
Amenities include a laid-back bistro and a dumpling bar, as well as an exercise room, a business centre and conference rooms. Parking and breakfast are available for a fee.

Name: Jasper Hotel
Description:
Hip hotel offering unassuming rooms & suites, as well as a restaurant, a gym & free Wi-Fi.
This trendy hotel is a 4-minute walk from Queen Victoria Market, 2 km from the Melbourne Museum and a minute's walk from the nearest tram stop.
Featuring wood furnishings and carpeted floors, the casual rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have separate living areas, balconies and/or sofabeds.
Access to Melbourne City Baths is complimentary. Other amenities consist of a restaurant, an interior courtyard and a gym, plus meeting and event space. Breakfast is available.

Name: Quest Flemington Central
Description:
Contemporary units with balconies in a sophisticated apartment hotel, plus a rooftop terrace & pool.
In a high-rise across from the Flemington racecourse, this sophisticated apartment hotel is a minuteâ€™s walk from the nearest tram stop and 3 km from Melbourne Zoo.
Ranging from studios to 2-bedroom apartments, the contemporary units offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes, as well as washer/dryers, and tea and coffeemaking equipment. All provide balconies; some have separate living and dining space.
A rooftop terrace has a heated infinity pool and panoramic city views. Other amenities include a gym and BBQ facilities. Breakfast (surcharge) and parking are available.

Name: Hotel 115 / 115 Grill & Brewhouse
Description:
Upmarket hotel with free Wi-Fi & stylish rooms, plus a grill restaurant & brewery.
This upscale hotel is 9.1 km from the National Gallery of Victoria and 10.1 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens.
All of the stylish, warm rooms have Wi-Fi and offer 42-inch flat-screen TVs, Apple iMac minis and desks, as well as minifridges and coffeemakers. Some add private balconies, whirlpool tubs, full kitchens with microwaves, and sofabeds.
Thereâ€™s a contemporary grill restaurant and brewery, plus fitness facilities and meeting spaces. Other amenities include coin-operated laundry facilities and parking.

Name: Mantra on Jolimont Melbourne
Description:
Informal apartment hotel featuring a restaurant/bar with a terrace, plus an outdoor pool & a gym.
A 6-minute walk from the William Barak Bridge/Melbourne Park tram stop, this informal apartment hotel is also a 7-minute walk from Melbourne Cricket Ground and 1 km from Federation Square.
The relaxed studios offer flat-screen TVs and Wi-Fi (fee), as well as kitchenettes. The 1- and 2-bedroom apartments have full kitchens and separate living rooms. Room service is available.
There's a casual restaurant with a terrace and a bar. Other amenities include a heated outdoor pool, a hot tub and a gym, plus a business centre and laundry facilities. Parking is available (surcharge).

Name: Saint Kilda Beach Hotel
Description:
Airy quarters in a relaxed hotel offering a cafe & a bar, plus meeting space & free Wi-Fi.
Set 1 km from amusement rides at Luna Park Melbourne, this casual hotel is also 1 km from St. Kilda Beach and 2 km from St. Kilda Botanical Gardens.
The relaxed, airy rooms offer free Wi-FI, flat-screen TVs and desks, plus minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites, some with bright murals, add whirlpool baths.
There's a trendy cafe and a bar. Other amenities include an exercise room, a business centre and meeting space. Breakfast is available for a fee.

Name: Quest Maribyrnong
Description:
Polished units with balconies & city views in a contemporary apartment hotel offering a gym.
A 2-minute walk from the nearest tram stop, this modern apartment hotel is also 5 minutes on foot from boutiques and restaurants at Highpoint shopping centre, and 15 minutesâ€?walk from Pipemakers Park along the banks of the Maribyrnong River.
Polished studios feature Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TVs and kitchenettes, as well as safes, and furnished balconies with city views. The 1- to 3-bedroom apartments have kitchens and separate living rooms.
Thereâ€™s a fitness centre. Breakfast is available.

Name: Adara Richmond
Description:
Modern apartments with kitchenettes or full kitchens, plus free Wi-Fi & a fitness room.
Less than a block from shops and cafes, this modern apartment hotel is 2.6 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens, 3.1 km from National Gallery of Victoria and 7 km from the Melbourne Zoo.
The contemporary studios come with kitchenettes and washer/dryers, plus free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. The 1- and 2-bedroom apartments add full kitchens and separate living spaces. Executive apartments feature balconies.
Amenities include a fitness room and a business centre.

Name: Glenferrie Hotel
Description:
Cosy Victorian restaurant and bar, plus straightforward rooms with whirlpool baths and free Wi-Fi.
A 4-minute walk from the Glenferrie train station, this enduring hotel with a stately facade and a Victorian pub is 8 km from both Federation Square and the Royal Botanic Gardens.
The subdued rooms feature free Wi-Fi, 107-cm flat-screens, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, plus whirlpool baths. Room service is available.
Amenities include a cosy restaurant and a Victorian bar with vintage details, in addition to an elegant lobby with leather seating and a grandfather clock. Parking is complimentary.

Name: Element Melbourne Richmond
Description:
Casual rooms in a straightforward hotel offering a restaurant & a fitness centre, plus free Wi-Fi.
Off State Route 21, this straightforward hotel is 4 km from the Melbourne Cricket Ground and 5 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria - Melbourne Gardens.
Streamlined rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows feature flat-screen TVs and free Wi-Fi, as well as minifridges, tea and coffeemaking equipment, and en suite, shower-only bathrooms. Some offer balconies. Room service is available.
Thereâ€™s a casual restaurant with a bar and terrace seating. Other amenities include a 24-hour gym, bicycle rentals and BBQ grills, plus coin-operated laundry facilities, electric charging stations and meeting space. Breakfast and parking are offered for a fee.

Name: City Limits Hotel
Description:
Unpretentious hotel offering bright rooms with complimentary Wi-Fi and wet bars.
Set in Chinatown, this straightforward hotel is a 3-minute walk from the Spring St/Bourke St tram stop and 2 km from Sea Life Melbourne Aquarium.
The bright rooms provide free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, seating areas and desks, as well as wet bars with minifridges and microwaves.
There's a business centre and a 24-hour reception. Parking and breakfast are available for an additional fee.

Name: Hotel Grand Chancellor Melbourne
Description:
Unpretentious hotel offering a rooftop pool & 2 restaurants, plus a gym & free Wi-Fi.
Set in a bustling commercial area, this unassuming hotel with a redbrick exterior is 2 km from Queen Victoria Market and a kilometre from the Melbourne Museum.
Relaxed rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minibars, plus rainfall showers, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have balconies and/or sitting areas.
Amenities include 2 restaurants (1 with a bar), meeting space and a gym, plus a rooftop terrace with an outdoor pool. Valet parking and breakfast are available.

Name: The Great Southern Hotel Melbourne
Description:
No-nonsense lodging with a casual restaurant, plus flat-screens in down-to-earth rooms.
In the city centre, this simple budget hotel is a 3-minute walk from Southern Cross train station, 1 km from Melbourne Convention and Exhibition Centre and 2 km from the Queen Victoria Market.
Simple rooms with minimalist decor feature Wi-Fi (fee) and flat-screen TVs, plus minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have courtyard views.
A casual restaurant serves continental breakfast for a surcharge. Other amenities include coin-operated laundry facilities, a courtyard and parking (fee).

Name: South Yarra Central Apartment Hotel
Categories: Hotel, Condominium complex, Extended stay hotel, Motel, Self-catering accommodation, Serviced accommodation

Name: Plum Serviced Apartments
Description:
Bright apartments with kitchenettes in a straightforward property offering access to a pool & a gym.
In an unfussy building next to a tram stop, these straightforward serviced apartments are 1 km from shopping and dining at the bustling Queen Victoria Market and 3 km from Melbourne Zoo.
The airy apartments feature kitchenettes, and living areas or separate living rooms, as well as free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. Some units add terraces.
Access to a nearby pool and fitness centre is included. Minimum-stay rules may apply.
Categories: Serviced accommodation, Apartment rental agency, Holiday apartment rental, Hotel

Name: Arden Motel
Description:
Simple rooms in a down-to-earth property offering complimentary continental breakfast & parking.
Set in a leafy neighbourhood, this down-to-earth motel in a low-rise building is a 14-minute walk from the long-standing Queen Victoria Market and 3 km from Melbourne Zoo.
The simple rooms come with flat-screen TVs, microwaves and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms feature sitting areas, while family rooms sleep up to 4 guests. Wi-Fi is available.
Complimentary amenities include continental breakfast and afternoon tea, as well as parking. There's also a barbecue area with seating.

Name: Essence Hotel Carlton
Description:
Straightforward rooms in a laid-back hotel featuring a Thai restaurant & an airy cafe.
In a modern building on a bustling street, this relaxed hotel is a 2-minute walk from the nearest tram stop, and a 12-minute walk from both the sprawling Queen Victoria Market and the Royal Exhibition Building.
Straightforward rooms with bright accents offer complimentary Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, and tea and coffeemaking equipment.
There's an airy cafe and a Thai restaurant, as well as a colourful lobby lounge. Parking and breakfast are available for a surcharge.

Name: Imagine Lighthouse
Description:
Stylish quarters in a sophisticated apartment hotel offering a spa, a sauna & an indoor pool.
Occupying a glass-and-steel high-rise tower in the vibrant central business district, this sophisticated apartment hotel is a 3-minute walk from the nearest tram stations, a 5-minute walk from Queen Victoria Market and a 16-minute walk from Melbourne Museum.
Featuring enclosed balconies and floor-to-ceiling windows with city views, the stylish 1- to 3-bedroom apartments offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, as well as kitchenettes, living and dining space, and washing machines.
Amenities include a heated indoor pool, a spa and a sauna, plus a fitness centre. Minimum stay rules apply.

Name: Meriton Suites Melbourne
Description:
Polished apartment hotel offering airy units with kitchens, plus an indoor pool, a sauna & a gym.
In the city centre near bars and restaurants, this sleek skyscraper apartment hotel is 3 minutes' walk from Southern Cross Station - Stop 1 tram, 2 km from Queen Victoria Market and 5 km from Port Melbourne Beach.
Stylish, contemporary apartments offer 1 to 3 bedrooms. All include Wi-Fi, TVs, full kitchens, living rooms and washer/dryers. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide city views. Some units have 2 bathrooms. Polished penthouses feature designer toiletries. Room service is available 24/7.
Amenities include a heated indoor pool, a sauna and a gym.

Name: Batman's Hill On Collins
Description:
Down-to-earth rooms, plus apartments with kitchens, in a low-key hotel featuring a restaurant.
Within the Melbourne Central Business District, this informal hotel is less than 1 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex and 5 km from the Melbourne Zoo.
Casual rooms have flat-screen TVs, minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Apartments add separate sitting areas and kitchens. Room service is available.
Amenities include a casual restaurant and a business centre.

Name: Adina Apartment Hotel Melbourne
Description:
Contemporary apartments in a polished hotel with a restaurant/bar & a gym with a pool.
This modern apartment hotel in central Melbourne is 1.3 km from the architecturally notable Federation Square, and 1.6 km from both the National Gallery of Victoria, and the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex.
Featuring open-plan kitchen, lounge and dining areas, the bright, contemporary apartments have washer/dryers, flat-screen TVs and Wi-Fi (fees may apply). Upgraded units add balconies, loft bedrooms or floor-to-ceiling windows. Room service is available.
Amenities include a casual restaurant/bar, as well as a gym with an indoor lap pool and a sauna. There are also 5 conference rooms.
Categories: Hotel, Event venue, Extended stay hotel, Holiday apartment rental, Serviced accommodation

Name: Dorsett Melbourne
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation, Wellness hotel

Name: Brady Hotels Central Melbourne
Description:
Polished quarters with wood floors and balconies, plus a relaxed restaurant & bar.
A 10-minute walk from the bustling Queen Victoria Market, this bright, modern hotel is 2 km from both the Sea Life Melbourne Aquarium and the casino at Crown Melbourne.
The streamlined rooms with wood floors feature Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges, as well as tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms and apartments add kitchenettes. Apartments also have separate living areas. Room service is available.
Amenities include a relaxed restaurant and bar, as well as an exercise room and a business centre.
Fulladdress: 30 Little La Trobe St, Melbourne VIC 3000

Name: Crown Towers Melbourne
Description:
High-end hotel with luxurious rooms & suites, plus an indoor pool, a gym & a sophisticated bar.
A kilometer from Flinders Street railway station, this high-end hotel overlooking the Yarra River is also 1 km from both the National Gallery of Victoria and Federation Square.
The upscale rooms and suites come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, iPod docks and city or bay views. Club level rooms add airy sitting areas and access to a lounge with complimentary breakfast and snacks. Suites have separate living areas and/or dining rooms. There's also a 1-bedroom villa with a study and a whirlpool tub.
Amenities include an indoor swimming pool, a fitness room and 2 rooftop tennis courts, plus a chic bar and a cocktail lounge.
Categories: Hotel, Bar, Business to business service, Conference center

Name: Zagame's House
Description:
Chic rooms & suites in a trendy hotel offering a restaurant/cafe, a wine bar & a gym.
In the Central Business District, this trendy hotel is a 14-minute walk from Queen Victoria Market, 8 minutes away on foot from the Melbourne Museum and a 4-minute walk from the nearest tram stop.
Chic rooms feature flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi and safes, in addition to minifridges and coffeemakers. Upgraded rooms add wet bars. Suites offer separate living areas. There's also room service.
Amenities include a cool restaurant/cafe, a wine bar and a gym. Breakfast and parking are available.

Name: Vibe Hotel Melbourne
Description:
Understated rooms & suites in a hip hotel offering a restaurant, a fitness centre & an indoor pool.
In an industrial-chic building with a historic facade, this upmarket hotel is a 9-minute walk from the Melbourne Skydeck and a 13-minute walk from the National Gallery of Victoria. Flinders Street train station is 5 minutesâ€?walk away.
Streamlined rooms with floor-to-ceiling windows feature Wi-Fi, smart TVs and coffeemakers, as well as rainfall showers. Some have river views. Suites add separate living areas and baths, and upgraded suites offer balconies. Room service is available.
Amenities include an indoor pool, a fitness centre and meeting space, plus a contemporary restaurant with a bar. Breakfast is available.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation

Name: The Chen Melbourne - Art Series
Description:
Chic rooms & suites in a trendy boutique hotel offering a gym, a bistro & a Chinese restaurant.
Set 19 km from Port Phillip Bay, this contemporary, art-filled boutique hotel is 3 km from Maranoa Gardens and 38 km from Melbourne Airport.
Sleek, sophisticated rooms with colourful artwork feature flat-screen TVs, free Wi-Fi and minibars, plus tea and coffeemakers. Suites include sitting areas and furnished balconies. Room service is available 24/7.
Amenities include a chic bistro and a Chinese restaurant. Thereâ€™s also a fitness centre.

Name: Hotel Chadstone Melbourne - MGallery Collection
Description:
Chic quarters in a refined hotel featuring a fashionable Italian restaurant, a bar & an indoor pool.
Next to Chadstone Shopping Centre, this polished, upscale hotel in a striking curved building is 2 km from the M1 freeway and 5 km from the Monash University Museum of Art.
The chic rooms feature flat-screen TVs and Wi-Fi, plus minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites add living rooms and/or balconies. Some provide free-standing baths and dining areas. Room service is offered 24/7.
Dining options include a fashionable Italian restaurant and a rooftop bar. Thereâ€™s also an indoor pool with city views, in addition to a gym, a spa and meeting/event space. Breakfast and parking are available.

Name: The Sebel Melbourne Malvern
Description:
Refined apartment hotel offering complimentary Wi-Fi, plus a gym, a hot tub & a rooftop terrace.
Among shops and restaurants off National Route Alt 1, this polished apartment hotel is 1 km from Monash University and 7 minutes on foot from Caulfield Racecourse.
Featuring modern accents, the streamlined 1- to 3-bedroom apartments, some with floor-to-ceiling windows, offer free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus kitchens, living rooms and dining areas, plus balconies.
Amenities include a rooftop terrace and a fitness centre, plus a sauna and a hot tub. Parking, massage services and loaner bikes are available for a fee.

Name: Adina Apartment Hotel Pentridge Melbourne
Description:
Sleek accommodations in an upscale apartment hotel featuring an airy restaurant & a wine bar.
Fronted by a Victorian-era stone wall, this upscale apartment hotel is a 2-minute walk from Divisions Gallery, 11 minutes away by foot from Batman train station and 1 km from Edgars Creek Parkland.
Sleek rooms provide TVs and Wi-Fi, plus espresso machines and minifridges. Studios add kitchenettes. The 1- to 2-bedroom apartments feature separate living rooms, dining areas and balconies, as well as washer/dryers.
An airy, genteel restaurant has exposed-brick walls and vaulted, wood-beamed ceilings. Other amenities include a wine bar and event space. Breakfast and parking are available.
Categories: Hotel, Event venue, Extended stay hotel, Restaurant, Serviced accommodation, Wine bar

Name: Quest Caroline Springs
Description:
Streamlined units, some with balconies, in a modern apartment hotel offering free parking & Wi-Fi.
Next to a shopping centre, this sleek apartment hotel is 9 km from Organ Pipes National Park, which features unusual geological formations, and 22 km from Melbourne Airport.
Streamlined studios provide free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and safes. All have kitchenettes, while 1- and 2-bedroom apartments add balconies, living rooms and DVD players. Upgraded apartments feature whirlpool baths.
Secured parking is complimentary. Grocery delivery service and breakfast are available (fees may apply).
Fulladdress: 234 Caroline Springs Blvd, Caroline Springs VIC 3023

Name: Brunswick Tower Hotel
Description:
Unfussy quarters in a straightforward lodging with free Wi-Fi & parking, plus a Japanese restaurant.
Set a 2-minute walk from the Moreland railway station, this unassuming hotel is 4 km from Melbourne Zoo, and 8 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex.
Featuring free Wi-Fi, the unpretentious rooms have flat-screen TVs, minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking equipment, plus shared bathrooms. Upgraded rooms have en suite facilities. A 1-bedroom apartment adds a full kitchen, a living/dining area and a private garden courtyard.
Parking is free. There's a casual Japanese restaurant serving Asian fusion dishes. Other amenities include a business centre and a coin-operated laundry.

Name: St Georges Motor Inn
Description:
Unpretentious motel offering a casual restaurant/bar, as well as Wi-Fi & breakfast.
An 11-minute walk from Croxton train station, this simple motel is 3 km from the lively shops and music venues of Brunswick Street, and 7 km from Melbourne city centre.
The modest rooms feature Wi-Fi, TVs and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms add whirlpool tubs. Some family rooms sleep up to 7 guests. Room service is available.
There's a laid-back restaurant/bar, plus guest laundry facilities. Breakfast and parking are available.

Name: Bell Motel
Description:
Unpretentious quarters in a down-to-earth property with free breakfast and Wi-Fi, plus a pool.
A 5-minute walk from East Preston tram depot, this casual redbrick motel is also 2 km from Preston Market and 9 km from Melbourne Zoo.
The modest rooms and suites offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Suites add whirlpool baths. The 1- and 2-bedroom apartments feature separate living areas and full kitchens.
Continental breakfast and parking is complimentary. Other amenities include an outdoor pool and a BBQ, as well as meeting facilities.

Name: Beau Monde International
Description:
Unassuming rooms & suites in an informal hotel with a restaurant, event space & a terrace.
On Route 36/40, this relaxed hotel is 4 km from the walking paths, playgrounds and BBQ areas at Ruffey Lake Park, and 6 km from the Currawong Bush Park nature reserve.
The unassuming rooms have flat-screen TVs, Wi-Fi and minifridges, plus tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms feature whirlpool tubs. Suites offer living areas; some add separate living rooms with extra beds. Room service is 24/7.
Amenities comprise an informal restaurant and event space, including a terrace. Afternoon tea, parking and cooked breakfast are available.
Categories: Hotel, Breakfast restaurant, Conference center, Event venue, Restaurant, Serviced accommodation, Wedding venue

Name: Punthill Apartment Hotels | Ivanhoe
Description:
Stylish units with kitchens in an upscale apartment hotel with a cafe/bar & free Wi-Fi.
In a striking, contemporary building, this upscale apartment hotel is 4 km from the Heide Museum of Modern Art and 7 km from Yarra Bend Park. Heidelberg train station is a 12-minute walk away.
The airy, stylish 1- and 2-bedroom apartments feature complimentary Wi-Fi, kitchens, washer/dryers and living rooms with sofabeds. Upgraded units add balconies.
Amenities include a cafe/bar and parking.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Holiday apartment rental, Serviced accommodation

Name: Comfort Inn Greensborough
Description:
Simple rooms & suites in an informal budget hotel with an outdoor pool, a restaurant & a BBQ area.
This relaxed budget hotel, set alongside Greensborough Highway, is a 14-minute walk from Macleod Train Station and 6 km from Heide Museum of Modern Art.
The simple rooms and suites offer Wi-Fi, minifridges, and tea and coffeemakers, as well as flat-screen TVs. Upgraded rooms add microwaves, and suites come with whirlpool baths.
Amenities include a casual restaurant, a seasonal outdoor pool and BBQ facilities. Parking and breakfast are available.

Name: Quest Preston
Description:
Laid-back apartment hotel featuring a fitness centre & meeting space, plus Wi-Fi & parking.
In a contemporary glass-fronted building, this relaxed apartment hotel is 9-minutes on foot from Preston railway station and 9 km from Melbourne Zoo.
Unassuming studios feature kitchenettes and sitting areas, plus TVs. The 1- to 3-bedroom apartments add separate living rooms, dining tables and kitchens. Some have balconies.
Amenities include a fitness room and meeting space, as well as guest laundry facilities. Wi-Fi and covered parking are available.

Name: East Brunswick Hotel
Description:
Chic rooms & suites in a sophisticated property offering a cocktail lounge & a restaurant/bar.
In a Victorian-style building set along a bustling commercial street, this sleek hotel is less than a minuteâ€™s walk from a tram stop. Itâ€™s 3 km from Melbourne Zoo and 4 km from Melbourne Museum.
Chic rooms come with free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges, as well as sitting areas, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms and suites add kitchenettes, dishwashers and separate living space.
Amenities include a trendy restaurant/bar and a hip cocktail lounge with a balcony. Thereâ€™s also a cellar with event space and private dining.
Categories: Pub, Bar, Function room facility, Piano bar, Restaurant, Sports bar

Name: Parkside Inn Motel & Conference Centre
Description:
Unassuming motel featuring meeting space & a restaurant, plus complimentary parking & Wi-Fi.
Set along State Route 27, this down-to-earth motel is 5 km from Plenty Gorge Park and 10 km from walking paths in Edwardes Lake Park.
Modest rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and minifridges, as well as microwaves, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have sitting areas. A 3-bedroom apartment features a kitchen, a bunk bed, and a living and dining area.
Parking is complimentary. Other amenities consist of a restaurant, meeting space and a business centre. Breakfast is available.

Name: Quest Ivanhoe
Description:
Modern studios & apartments with kitchens in an informal hotel offering free Wi-Fi.
Set in a bustling shopping village, this relaxed apartment hotel is 4 km from both Yarra Bend Park and the Heide Museum of Modern Art, and 10 km from Melbourne Zoo.
Laid-back, modern studios offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and work desks, plus kitchenettes, and tea and coffeemakers. The 1- and 2-bedroom apartments add full kitchens and separate living areas, as well as washer/dryers; some feature furnished balconies.
Amenities include barbecue facilities, meeting rooms and guest laundry facilities. Parking is available for a fee.

Name: Clocktower Apartment Hotel Melbourne
Description:
Informal 1- to 2-bedroom serviced apartments offering kitchens, washer/dryers & flat-screens.
Set on a tree-lined street among lively shops and restaurants in the Lygon Street Precinct, these casual serviced apartments are 7 minutes' walk from a tram stop, a 9-minute walk from Melbourne Museum and 2 km from Queen Victoria Market.
Featuring balconies or terraces, the bright, relaxed 1- and 2-bedroom apartments offer Wi-Fi (fee), and living areas with flat-screen TVs, plus kitchens and washer/dryers.
Breakfast, parking, and grocery delivery services are all available for a surcharge.

Name: BIG4 Melbourne Holiday Park
Description:
Informal holiday park offering unfussy chalets, plus an outdoor pool, a hot tub & a BBQ area.
Set 3 km from State Route 55, this informal holiday park in a residential area is 9 km from Melbourne Zoo and 4 km from Preston Market.
The simply furnished 1- to 3-bedroom chalets come with kitchenettes and flat-screen TVs. Upgraded chalets have whirlpool tubs and/or washing machines; family chalets offer bunk beds. A caravan park and campsites are also available.
Amenities include an outdoor pool, a hot tub and a BBQ area, as well as cinema and TV rooms, a kids' playground and a game room.

Name: Parkville Place Serviced Apartments
Description:
Unassuming apartment hotel featuring streamlined units with kitchenettes & desks.
A 7-minute walk from a tram stop, this modest apartment hotel is a block from the greenery of Royal Park, and 6 km from city views at the Melbourne Skydeck.
Streamlined apartments feature kitchenettes and desks, as well as Wi-Fi and TVs. Upgraded apartments add living areas. Family apartments can sleep up to 6 people; some have balconies.
Parking and coin-operated laundry facilities are available.

Name: Royal Derby Hotel
Description:
Vibrant pub offering simple rooms & a beer garden, plus modern dining & live sports.
Set in a former 1920s social club on a busting street, this lively pub with rooms is 3.2 km from Queen Victoria Market, and 7 km from the nightlife, entertainment and casino at the Crown Entertainment Complex.
The simple shared dorms and private rooms feature wood floors and colourful accents, and include free Wi-Fi. Minimum-stay rules may apply.
A hip bar/restaurant with exposed brick walls serves classic pub food, and there's a pool table, a beer garden and live sports. Guests get discounts on food. Other amenities include a shared kitchenette with a microwave and a fridge, plus laundry facilities. There are also regular live music nights.
Categories: Pub, Bar, Beer garden, Cocktail bar, Function room facility, Hostel, Hotel, Self-catering accommodation, Sports bar

Name: The Nunnery Accommodation
Description:
Quirky former convent featuring both simple budget rooms and stylish boutique accommodation.
Set in a former 19th-century convent, this quirky guesthouse is a 4-minute walk from the Melbourne Museum, 2.1 km from Queen Victoria Market and 2.7 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.
The simple, budget rooms provide double and dormitory accommodation, Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs. They also include tables or desks. Upgraded rooms and suites add marble fireplaces and stylish decor.
Breakfast is provided. The property features Georgian-style accents and stained glass windows, as well as outdoor courtyards. A cosy lounge with a fireplace and a shared kitchen are also available.

Name: Best Western Plus The Tudor-Box Hill
Description:
Casual hotel offering a restaurant, a bar & event space, plus an indoor pool & a sauna.
Set on a tranquil residential street, this laid-back hotel is 7 km from a golf course at Wattle Park and 12 km from the Heide Museum of Modern Art. Laburnum train station is a 10-minute walk away.
Relaxed rooms offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screens and sitting areas, plus minibars and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Upgraded rooms add whirlpool baths. The 1- to 3-bedroom apartments feature kitchens and washer/dryers.
Parking is complimentary. Thereâ€™s also a casual Italian restaurant and a bar, as well as meeting and event space. Other amenities include an indoor pool, a hot tub and a sauna, plus a gym and a coin-operated laundry.
Fulladdress: 1101 Whitehorse Rd, Maroondah Hwy, Box Hill VIC 3128
Categories: Hotel, Lodge, Motel, Resort hotel, Restaurant
Owner: Best Western Plus The Tudor-Box Hill (owner)

Name: City Edge Box Hill Apartment Hotel
Description:
Budget apartment hotel offering down-to-earth units with kitchens & complimentary Wi-Fi.
In a residential neighbourhood, this budget apartment hotel in a modern building is an 8-minute walk from Box Hill Central train station and 4 km from Westfield Doncaster mall.
Unpretentious studios offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, washer/dryers and kitchens, plus living areas with sofabeds; most have balconies. The 2-bedroom apartments add separate living/dining rooms.
Secured parking is offered. Bike storage is complimentary. Continental breakfast is available for a surcharge.
Owner: City Edge Box Hill Apartment Hotel (owner)

Name: Kimberley Gardens Hotel
Description:
Unfussy accommodations in a low-key hotel featuring an indoor heated pool, a hot tub & a gym.
This warm, low-key hotel in a residential area is a 6-minute walk from a tram stop and 2 km from St. Kilda Botanical Gardens.
Unfussy rooms feature free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities, plus balconies or courtyard access. Some have whirlpool tubs. The 1-bedroom units and bi-level villas provide kitchens, dining spaces and living areas. Kids age 11 and under (1 per room) stay at no charge with an adult. Room service is offered.
Parking and loaner bikes are included. There's an indoor heated pool, a hot tub and a gym. Continental breakfast (fee) is served in a relaxed lobby. Minimum-stay rules may apply.
Fulladdress: 441 Inkerman St, St Kilda East VIC 3183
Categories: Hotel, Group accommodation, Accommodation, Serviced accommodation

Name: Avani Melbourne Box Hill Residences
Description:
Contemporary units in an upscale apartment hotel offering an infinity pool, a hot tub & a gym.
Set among residences and commercial businesses, this sleek apartment hotel is a 6-minute walk from Box Hill Gardens, 9 km from the Heide Museum of Modern Art and 34 km from Melbourne Airport.
Featuring balconies, the contemporary 1- to 2-bedroom apartments provide smart TVs and Wi-Fi, in addition to separate living rooms, kitchenettes, dining areas and washer/dryers.
Thereâ€™s a rooftop infinity pool. Other amenities include a hot tub, a gym, a sauna and a communal kitchen. Parking is available.

Name: Ovolo South Yarra
Description:
Retro-style quarters in a hip hotel offering a restaurant & a bar, plus a 24-hour fitness centre.
A 3-minute walk from South Yarra train station, this hip hotel with a glass-and-steel facade is 2 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens Victoria - Melbourne Gardens and 5 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.
Cosy, retro-style rooms feature Wi-Fi and smart TVs, plus minibars, tea and coffeemaking facilities, and safes. Upgraded rooms have sitting areas with pull-out sofas, and rock starâ€“inspired suites add wet bars.
Thereâ€™s a funky restaurant and bar, as well as guest laundry facilities and a 24-hour fitness centre. Breakfast is available.

Name: Quest Kew
Description:
Simple units featuring kitchens in a laid-back apartment hotel with an outdoor pool.
A 2-minute walk from Kew Shopping Centre tram stop, this relaxed apartment hotel off a street with shops and eateries is also 8 km from Melbourne's Central Business District, and 9 km from the Royal Botanic Gardens Melbourne.
Straightforward 1- to 3-bedroom apartments come with kitchens, living rooms and washer/dryers, as well as Wi-Fi (fee), TVs and DVD players. All also provide balconies or patios.
Amenities include an outdoor pool, a BBQ area and a business centre. Parking is offered for a surcharge.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation

Name: Quest Prahran
Description:
Informal apartment hotel with 1- to 3-bedroom units offering kitchens, living areas & free Wi-Fi.
Set 1 minutes' walk from the nearest tram stop, this relaxed apartment hotel is 4 km from Luna Park, 5 km from the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex, and 6 km from the Melbourne Central Business District.
The laid-back 1- to 3-bedroom apartments offer free Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs and kitchens, plus washer/dryers, and separate living/dining areas. Some units add furnished balconies and/or extra bathrooms.
Parking is available for a fee. Other amenities include meeting rooms.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation

Name: The Olsen Melbourne - Art Series
Description:
Chic suites in an art-filled lodging with trendy restaurants, a spa and a glass-bottomed pool.
Set among the trendy boutiques and upscale shops of Chapel Street, this chic all-suite hotel is 2.7 km from Melbourne Cricket Ground and 3.5 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.
Featuring original artwork, the contemporary suites offer Wi-Fi (fee), flat-screen TVs and iPod docks, plus kitchenettes and minibars. Upgraded suites add separate living areas; some feature hot tubs, balconies, terraces or full kitchens. Room service is available 24/7.
The hotel has a trendy steakhouse and a modern Australian restaurant. Other amenities include a spa, a gym and a courtyard with a glass-bottomed pool. Bike, scooter and Smart car rentals are available.

Name: The Hamptons Apartments - St Kilda Apartment Hotel
Owner: The Hamptons Apartments - St Kilda Apartment Hotel (owner)

Name: The Como Melbourne
Description:
Stylish property featuring a rooftop indoor pool, a cocktail bar & 2 restaurants, plus a sundeck.
Among the upscale shops of South Yarra's Chapel Street, this chic hotel is a 5-minute walk from South Yarra train station and 4 km from the National Gallery of Victoria.
Contemporary rooms offer Wi-Fi, flat-screen TVs, safes and minibars, as well as tea and coffeemaking facilities; some have whirlpool baths. Suites add living rooms; some feature balconies, or kitchenettes and saunas. Room service is available 24/7.
Amenities include 2 restaurants and a cocktail bar. There's also a sauna, an indoor rooftop pool and a fitness centre, plus a sundeck. Breakfast and parking are offered for a surcharge.

Name: Pullman Melbourne On The Park
Description:
Relaxed rooms in an upmarket hotel featuring a Mediterranean restaurant & a bar, plus a spa.
Across the road from Fitzroy Gardens, this upscale hotel is a 10-minute walk from the Melbourne Cricket Ground and 3 km from the Queen Victoria Market.
Informal rooms feature flat-screen TVs, minibars, tea and coffeemaking facilities and Wi-Fi (fee). Upgraded rooms add city and garden views as well as lounge areas. Kids age 11 and under (2 per room) stay at no charge with an adult.
There's a breakfast buffet. Other amenities a Mediterranean restaurant and a bar. There's also a spa with a sauna and a steam room, plus a gym, meeting/conference rooms and an outdoor pool (fee). Parking is available (surcharge)

Name: Le M¨¦ridien Melbourne
Description:
Genteel hotel featuring chic rooms & suites, plus a French restaurant & an outdoor pool.
On a street lined with eateries and shops, this refined hotel with an art deco facade is a 7-minute walk from Parliament House, 9 minutes on foot from Chinatown and a minute's walk from a tram stop.
Chic rooms, some with Parliament House views, feature floor-to-ceiling windows, Wi-Fi and TVs, as well as minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking equipment. The 1- and 2-bedroom suites, some with dining tables, have separate living rooms.
There's a French restaurant and an art deco style cafe/bar, plus a 24/7 gym. Other amenities include an outdoor heated pool and a poolside bar with skyline views. Breakfast and parking are available.
Categories: Hotel, Meeting planning service, Wedding venue

Name: Cosmopolitan Hotel and Apartments
Description:
Contemporary hotel featuring bright quarters, plus Wi-Fi access,  parking & meeting space.
This contemporary hotel is a 3-minute walk from the rides at Luna Park, and 6 km from gaming at the Crown Casino and Entertainment Complex.
The modern rooms feature Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking equipment. Upgraded rooms add private balconies. There are also studios and apartments with kitchenettes.
Parking is available. Other amenities include a guest lounge and laundry facilities, plus a meeting room.

Name: Punthill Apartment Hotels | Oakleigh
Description:
Laid-back hotel featuring modest quarters, as well as a hot tub, a gym & complimentary parking.
This informal hotel in a modern building is an 11-minute walk from trains at Oakleigh Station, 4 km from the Monash University Museum of Art and 8 km from Wattle Park, Melbourne.
Ranging from rooms to studios and apartments, the straightforward quarters provide Wi-Fi access, flat-screen TVs and balconies, as well as microwaves, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have minifridges, kitchenettes and/or sitting areas.
Parking is complimentary. Other amenities consist of guest laundry facilities, a hot tub and a gym.
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Serviced accommodation

Name: Hawthorn Gardens Serviced Apartments
Description:
Informal apartments with kitchens and balconies or terraces, plus shared gardens and free parking.
Set in a commercial area off the M1 highway, this relaxed apartment hotel is 8 km from the National Gallery of Victoria and 10 km from Melbourne's central business district.
Featuring free Wi-Fi, the streamlined 1- to 3-bedroom apartments also have flat-screen TVs with DVD players. All feature full kitchens, washer/dryers and balconies or courtyards. The 2-storey apartments also offer 2 bathrooms, dining areas and furnished outdoor areas.
Amenities include courtyard-style gardens and free underground parking. BBQs are available (fee).

Name: Novotel Melbourne Glen Waverley
Description:
Laid-back rooms & suites in a sleek hotel with a restaurant, a sauna & an indoor pool, plus a bar.
This sophisticated hotel is a 4-minute walk from Glen Waverley Railway Station, 5 km from the Monash Gallery of Art (MGA) and 4 km from the walking trails of Jells Park.
Relaxed rooms and suites provide Wi-Fi access, satellite TV and minifridges, as well as en suite bathrooms, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have sitting areas and/or whirlpool baths. Room service is available.
Amenities consist of an unassuming restaurant, a bar and meeting space, plus a sauna, an indoor pool and a gym. An airport shuttle, breakfast and parking are available.

Name: Quest Burwood East
Categories: Hotel, Extended stay hotel, Group accommodation, Indoor lodging, Accommodation, Self-catering accommodation, Serviced accommodation

Name: The Waverley International Hotel
Description:
Modern property offering understated rooms & free parking, plus a relaxed restaurant/bar.
A 9-minute walk from Glen Waverley train station, this contemporary hotel is 4 km from Jells Park and 9 km from the 100-acre Caribbean Gardens and market.
Understated, streamlined rooms feature free Wi-Fi and flat-screen TVs, plus minifridges, and tea and coffeemaking facilities. Some have sofabeds and/or iPod docks. Family rooms have separate sitting areas and whirlpool baths.
Parking is complimentary. There's a relaxed restaurant/bar serving breakfast, dinner and snacks.
